subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees started the season with a loss at home to the Red Sox and the left-hander Jon Lester. It was not a good sign for the Yankees’ starter, C. C. Sabathia.
snippet: The Yankees started the season with a loss at home to the Red Sox and the left-hander Jon Lester. It was not a good sign for the Yankees’ starter, C. C. Sabathia.
